name: One Wacky Dream
description:
You play as a faceless and nameless kid who has severe sleeping troubles. Your goal is to defeat as many demons as possible before you wake up from your terrible nightmare. Collect powerups and use your shotgun's recoil to move around the endless hallways.

This is my submission for the Brackeys 2022.1 It Is Not Real Game Jam. I apologize for the lack of sounds, particles, animations, etc. I only had a few days to work on this project. You are supposed to be able to walk, but it doesn't work anymore for some reason.
